altTitle: 100人の英雄を育てた最強預言者は、冒険者になっても世界中の弟子から慕われてます
The Greatest Prophet who Nurtured 100 Heroes, Even if He Becomes an Adventurer, His Disciples Throughout the World will still Yearn for Him
title: 100-nin no Eiyuu wo Sodateta Saikyou Yogensha wa, Boukensha ni Natte mo Sekaijuu no Deshi kara Shitawaretemasu
